name: fish_god
summary: ./dreamsim.exe "I feel a spectral copy of my body; like a soul, escape my me ...

messages.message: ./dreamsim.exe "I feel a spectral copy of my body; like a soul, escape my me for a moment .  The faint purple outline lifts from the skin on my head and twists horrizontally ; its face, my face, stretches wide open and bites violently at the frail air, puntuated by the murmer of benign conversation and bouncing violin music ."

define(THE_HUNGER, "Sex is life is sex is life is sex is life is sex is life is sex is life is sex is life is sex is life Sex is life is sex is life is sex is life is sex is life is sex is life is sex is life is sex is life Sex is life is sex is life is sex is life is sex is life is sex is life is sex is life is sex is life Sex is life is sex is life is sex is life is sex is life is sex is life is sex is life is sex is life"

